skipWarning.season: This will skip the next season premiere reminder.

settings.title: Settings
settings.confirmLogout: Are you sure you want to log out?
settings.confirmDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
settings.deleteAccountWarning: This will permanently delete all your data
settings.releaseRemindersDescription: Get notified when your saved movies and shows are released
settings.accentColorDescription: Choose the highlight color used across the app.
settings.launchScreenDescription: Choose which screen the app opens to when you launch it.
settings.accentColorNote: This changes buttons, highlights, and other accent elements.
settings.launchScreenNote: This setting will take effect the next time you open the app.
settings.updateLaunchScreenError: Failed to update launch screen preference. Please try again.
settings.updateLanguageError: Failed to update language. Please try again.
settings.languageScreenDescription: Select your preferred language for movie and TV show information.
settings.languageScreenNote: This affects titles, descriptions, and other text from our movie database. Some content may not be available in all languages.
settings.updateRegionError: Failed to update region. Please try again.
settings.regionScreenDescription: Select your region to see local streaming availability and release dates.
settings.regionScreenNote: This affects where to watch information and local release dates.

profile.title: Profile
profile.autoAddToWatchingDescription: Automatically add series to your Watching list when you mark an episode as watched
profile.autoAddToAlreadyWatchedDescription: Automatically add movies to your Already Watched list when you rate or mark them as watched
profile.quickMarkAsWatchedDescription: Skip the date selection modal and use the current time when marking movies as watched
profile.showListIndicatorsDescription: Display a badge on cards when an item is in any of your lists
profile.copyInsteadOfMoveDescription: When bulk adding from a list, keep items in the source list
profile.markPreviousEpisodesDescription: Automatically mark earlier episodes in a season as watched when you mark an episode
profile.blurPlotSpoilersDescription: Hide plot summaries by default to avoid spoilers. Tap to reveal.
profile.hideWatchedContentDescription: Remove watched movies and shows from search and discovery
profile.checkConnection: Please check your connection and try again
profile.hideUnreleasedDescription: Hide movies and TV shows that haven't been released yet
profile.hideTabLabelsDescription: Show only icons in the bottom navigation bar
profile.dataSaverDescription: Load lower resolution images to save data
profile.updatePreferenceError: Failed to update preference. Please try again.
profile.guestAccountExportMessage: Exporting is not available in guest mode. Please sign in to export your data.
profile.supportDevelopmentMessage: If you enjoy ShowSeek and want to support development, you can donate using one of the addresses below. Thank you!
profile.unableToOpenPlayStore: Unable to open the Play Store.

howItWorks.conflictsDescription: If we detect any conflicts, we'll show what happened and keep your data consistent.

trakt.privacyNote: We only use Trakt to sync your watch history. You can disconnect at any time.
